1.content:
pregnant female

Female weight gain
1.title: start

11.content:
Let's see. Four options to fill (the fifth must be 'something else') with suggestions for girls who will gain weight because of pregnancy.

The rules are -

no sex
pregnant characters start pregnant
only 1 character at a time
stay on main character
no killing
no vore/expansion
no wanting gain
only button popping
no nudity
no ripping clothes

And it has to be at 13+ standard.
The term 'girls' is ambiguous, and could apply to any age. Therefore I think age should be the real variant.

I propose the following -

Annie was nine when she was digging through her mother's old clothes in the attic. She found a mysterious pair of panties which magically made her pregnant when she put them on. The more she wears them the bigger and heavier she will become, but it is a while before she suspects that there is a baby growing inside her because that is impossible. (Yes, I had to use an element from one of my stories - it seemed the best way to create a sexless pregnancy.)

Betty was twelve when her mother caught her holding hands with a boy and kissing him. Her mother put an immediate stop to it but the damage was done and soon her belly started to grow. (It seemed fitting to play with an old pregnancy myth as though it were fact.)

Judy was fifteen when her parents finally caved in to her repeated requests for a sibling, but there was a catch. Her mother could not carry the child to term, so they had the baby implanted in Judy's womb. (Unorthodox but technically plausible.)

Melissa was eighteen when she fell pregnant in the usual fashion. Her boyfriend dumped her as soon as he knew about the baby, and no boy would touch her after she started to show. (Which means nothing but clean living for her from now on.)
11.title: pregnant

choices: A resturaunt that makes sure the customer gets the "nutrition they need
A friend of yours has a surprise for you
12.content: how will the weight gain proceed.
12.title: weight gain

choices: Centa secretly is trying to make Kira chubby.
The two girls accidentally compet to see who can eat the most.
133.content:
One day Kira ( a 18 year old black haired white girl that weighed 100ibs at about 5.5ft tall ) heard her dore bell ring. "Who is it?" "It's Centa!" ( who is a blonde haired chubby girl that ways 180ibs and is also about 5.5ft tall ) "Okay come in" "I made some homemade brownies...But I think I made to many...So I came over here to see if you wanted any"
"Thank goodness! I haven't had anything to eat today! I had to skip breakfast so I could get to my College classes in time! But I can't have to many or else my boyfriend might get mad at me...We can eat the brownies while we watch TV. "That sounds like a great Idea!" So the two girls got comfortable on the couch with the big plate of brownies.
"Here Kira you hold them" "Mmm I am so hungry I can't wait to dig in!"
133.title: Kira.

1331.content: As they watch TV Kira keeps eating the brownies while yet she doesn't notice that Centa hasn't eaten any. " Hey Kira I will be right back I need to fat my purse from my car" " Okay " Centa comes back with her purse and sneaks in 2 more large plates of Brownies. " Mmm these brownies are good. What's in them?" " Oh! Just Chocolate, peanuttbutter, and my talent" " To bad I just ate the last one" " Don't worry" Centa pulls out one of the 2 large plates and puts it in Kira's lape. " Why thanks! They are so good I feel like I could eat them all day" As Kira keeps munching on the brownies so does not notice her new 10 pounds or thar Centa is not eating any. " Hey Centa I'm thirsty. Could you get me a can of Dr.pepper out of the fridge please?" "Okay!" Centa's plan was working out perfectly. As Kira polished off the 2nd Plat ( Now weighing in at about 180ibs ) her stomach was started to come out on top of her cargo shorts. But she didn't notice because she was in brownie land eating the 3rd plate of brownies.
1331.title: Centa secretly is trying to make Kira chubby.

13311.content:
Kira let out a loud burp as she Finnished the brownies and her soda. "Uhh I have a stomach ach...I think I ate to many urrrppp" " I know what you need! Some Ice cream should help your stomach ach" "Really? That's a weird cure" I will go get you some ice cream" "Alright. Anything to get rid of this stomach ach!" " Be right back!" Centa returned from the store and handed Kira 3 large tubs of ice cream. "Gosh Centa that's a lot of ice cream!" " Yeah. But you need to ear all of it for it to help with your stomach ach" Kira plowed through the ice cream hopeing to stop the stomach ach. Sh did not notice however how big her stomach was. Neather did she pay attention to the fat forming on her thighs and lower stomach. " Uhh I finnished it all but the stomach ach only seams worse" " Hmm maybe you didn't eat quite enough. Let's see...Ah this Pie in here ought to work!" " Pie? You sure this will work?" "Positive!" " Okay then" The pie was heated up and
and in that same amount of time Kira ate it. She now weighs in at 190ibs" Oh I got to get going Kira or else I will be late for my job" " Alright then urrpp I hope to see you soon! Oh and do you think you could bring some more brownies" " Of course I can!"
13311.title: Part 2.

133111.content:
Kira now with a noticeable chubby belly hanging over her pants ( although she keeps squeezing into her old clothes thinking she is still 100ibs ) "Oh I almost forgot that I need to be at Peters ( her Boyfriend ) house by 6:00pm!" She squeezes in some jeans but her stomach hangs over also her bra is tight and so is her shirt. She shows up at her boyfriends house and knocks on the door. " Who Is it?!" " It's me Kira!" " Okay come in" " Hay Peter!" ( Peter is stunned as he noticed Kira's new chubb. " Hey dinner I'd almost ready. Why don't you just sit on the couch" " Okay" After dinner they both sat down on the couch. Kira leaning against Peter. Peter gradually reached out under Kira's shirt and started running her chubby tummy. " Hey Kira I have been meaning to tell you something..." "what is it" " Well umm...I...umm" " Huh?" " Umm I LIKE YOUR CHUBBY BELLY!..." " What!" " Yes I do... I enjoy it's soft feeling...and also I like your fatter Boobs and thighs...They make you look cute" " You really think so?"
" Yes. And I think you should gain a bit more".
133111.title: The weekend.

1331111.content:
Ding dong. " Who is it?!" "It's me centa! I have brownies!" ( Kira ignored her date with Peter and continued to live life as normal without any intention on gaining weight ) " Great! Come on in!" This time Centa brought in 4 large plates of Brownies, some ice cream, and 2L of Dr.pepper. " Here are some brownies! I am glad you like them. Eat as many as you want!😊"
" Oh you bet I will! Theas brownies are addicting!" " I also brought you some ice cream and Dr.pepper
. You should try putting the ice cream on your brownies." " Mmm
( Kira's stomach growled as she picked up the brownies )Just as good as I remember them..." Kira kept on stuffing the brownies. By the time she plowed on trough the 3rd plate and going to the 4th she chugged down the entire 2L of Dr.pepper. " Urrrrrrrrrppppppp...Hand that 4th plate over here." " Okay" Kira smothered her last few brownies in ice cream. " Uhh I'm so full..." POP! A button just flew across the room. "Whoops... guess I ate to much" Kira now weighs 220ibs. Hardy ant showin her face. Most of the fat was in her lower belly and thighs. Kira started rubbing her chubby bloated belly. " Urrrrrrrrrpppppp Centa... I kinda enjoy this...this feeling of being chubby and bloated" " now you know why I don't exercise Kira. I love my chubbiness".
1331111.title: Centa's second visit.

13311111.content: Centa continued to visit Kira's house. Bringing brownies and other such junk food. Both girls stuffed themselves with food and rubbed there new fat. Of course Peter was VARY happy with this. He also would stuff Kira whenever he had the chance.
13311111.title: The end.
